about.title: About me
about.text: Hi there ! My name is Antoine GROSJAT and i'm a Junior Web Integrator passionate about creating interactive and aesthetic websites. With a solid training followed at Openclassrooms in 2023/2024 in HTML, CSS and JavaScript, I am dedicated to transforming visual concepts into engaging and functional user experiences.
about.text1: I am passionate about web development and always looking for new opportunities to learn and grow. My goal is to continue to improve my skills, explore new technologies, and contribute to challenging projects that push the boundaries of web design.

projects.title: Kasa
projects.description: Creation of a real estate rental web application with React.
projects.additionalInfo: Kasa is the first React project that I carried out as part of my web integrator training.
projects.objectives: From a model provided, I completely redesigned this real estate rental application. Using React and React Router libraries allowed me to create a dynamic and interactive user interface, and Sass made it easier to manage styles. Housing datas are imported from a Json file provided for better performance and ease of updating.

projects.title: Nina Carducci
projects.description: SEO optimization of a photographer's website.
projects.additionalInfo: In this project I reviewed the site's code in order to detect, using web tools, what could impact its performance and make the necessary corrections.
projects.objectives: With the audits carried out with Wave for accessibility and Lighthouse for general performances, I was able to find and update the code that had many issues in these areas. Reducing the weight of images, minifying style files or even implementing referencing tags allows a clear improvement in the performance of the application.

projects.title: Argent Bank
projects.description: Development of the front-end of a banking application with React.
projects.additionalInfo: Argent Bank is a project carried out as part of my web integrator training at OpenClassrooms.
projects.objectives: The objective was firstly to set up a user interface with a secure authentication system, and secondly, I produced a document via Swagger, describing the API routes on the back-end side, which would allow the user to carry out certain personal transactions.
